data.text:
One day, the weather was nice so I decided to have lunch on 
the roof… and found I wasn't the first one.
data.processed:
<story>One day, the weather was nice so I decided to have lunch on 
<story>the roof… and found I wasn't the first one.

data.text: Mmm… Yeah! Really? I'm glad to hear you're all doing well.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Mmm… Yeah! Really? I'm glad to hear you're all doing well.

data.text:
Me? Yeah, I'm getting by… Oh, 
you heard about the Selection Race?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Me? Yeah, I'm getting by… Oh, 
<story>you heard about the Selection Race?

data.text:
Ah, uh, about that… Uuh. I don't have a trainer yet. 
Yeah, so my debut will be a little longer—
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Ah, uh, about that… Uuh. I don't have a trainer yet. 
<story>Yeah, so my debut will be a little longer—

data.text:
Nnno, it's not that I'm unreliable! It's just 
that I'm kind of… well, you know.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Nnno, it's not that I'm unreliable! It's just 
<story>that I'm kind of… well, you know.

data.text:
… Yeah. Mmm, thanks. I know you're all looking forward 
to it, I'll do my best to make it work!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>… Yeah. Mmm, thanks. I know you're all looking forward 
<story>to it, I'll do my best to make it work!

data.text: See you later… Yes, yeeeah. See you.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>See you later… Yes, yeeeah. See you.

data.text: … Pheeeeeew～～～～～.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>… Pheeeeeew～～～～～.

data.text: Wahh!? You, you're the one from the other day…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Wahh!? You, you're the one from the other day…

data.text: Wahh!? Oh, it's you, from the other day…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Wahh!? Oh, it's you, from the other day…

data.text:
Ah? Oh dearie. Did you want to have lunch here by 
any chance? I'm sorry if I'm in your way.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Ah? Oh dearie. Did you want to have lunch here by 
<story>any chance? I'm sorry if I'm in your way.

data.text:
You've got good taste, though—. It's such a beautiful day, 
eating on the rooftop sure sounds great.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>You've got good taste, though—. It's such a beautiful day, 
<story>eating on the rooftop sure sounds great.

data.text:
You have good taste, though—. It's such a beautiful day, 
eating on the rooftop sure sounds great.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>You have good taste, though—. It's such a beautiful day,

data.text: I'm sure it's very refreshing… Hmm.
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: Phone not leaving you too happy?
Phone having you feel a little down?

data.processed: <story>I'm sure it's very refreshing… Hmm.

data.text: What? Oh, you mean the call?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>What? Oh, you mean the call?

data.text:
Ahaha, no way! My cute 
juniors from my hometown called me. Of course I'm happy!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, no way! My cute 
<story>juniors from my hometown called me. Of course I'm happy!

data.text:
Bless them, they still keep in touch with me after I moved to 
Tracen Academy. They're all such good kids.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Bless them, they still keep in touch with me after I moved to 
<story>Tracen Academy. They're all such good kids.

data.text:
I wouldn't have thought of coming to the 
school if they hadn't talked to me about it in the first place…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>I wouldn't have thought of coming to the 
<story>school if they hadn't talked to me about it in the first place…

data.text: Ahaha, I knew you'd be surprised. But it's true.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Ahaha, I knew you'd be surprised. But it's true.

data.text:
As you said the other day, I was only running 
because it was fun and felt good.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>As you said the other day, I was only running 
<story>because it was fun and felt good.

data.text:
As you said the other day, I only ran because 
it was fun and felt good to do so.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>As you said the other day, I only ran because 
<story>it was fun and felt good to do so.

data.text:
And then the kids around me had high hopes… 
Telling me they "wanted to see more of me running and winning".
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>And then the kids around me had high hopes… 
<story>Telling me they "wanted to see more of me running and winning".

data.text: So as their senior, how could I not respond?
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: So that's how you ended up at Tracen Academy…
choices.processed: <size=33>So that's how you ended up at Tracen Academy…</size>

data.processed: <story>So as their senior, how could I not respond?

data.text: Heheh, that's how.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Heheh, that's how.

data.text: … But well, that's all I can really say as well.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>… But well, that's all I can really say as well.

data.text: —Aah, it's her!! Maruzenskyyyyy!!
data.name: Junior Horsegirl A
data.processed: <story>—Aah, it's her!! Maruzenskyyyyy!!

data.text: Oh my! …Hiii, you're off to independent training? Good luck!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Oh my! …Hiii, you're off to independent training? Good luck!

data.text:
Thank you so much! I'll be sure to teach my 
body everything you've taught me! See you!
data.name: Junior Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>Thank you so much! I'll be sure to teach my 
<story>body everything you've taught me! See you!

data.text: Have a good daaay! Don't push yourself too hard～!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Have a good daaay! Don't push yourself too hard～!

data.text: … Heheh, how cute.
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: You're very popular with the juniors here, too.
choices.processed: <size=36>You're very popular with the juniors here, too.</size>

choices.text: You're really popular with the juniors here, too.
choices.processed: <size=35>You're really popular with the juniors here, too.</size>

data.processed: <story>… Heheh, how cute.

data.text: Bless them. They're all so nice and adorable.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Bless them. They're all so nice and adorable.

data.text:
… That girl… She said she has a much younger sister who was 
really shy and scared to go outside at one point.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>… That girl… She said she has a much younger sister who was 
<story>really shy and scared to go outside at one point.

data.text:
She took her to see the Twinkle series together, and apparently 
she really enjoyed it. It healed her fright quickly, she said.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>She took her to see the Twinkle series together, and apparently 
<story>she really enjoyed it. It healed her fright quickly, she said.

data.text:
So, she's working hard at this school to show 
her sister more fun sights.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>So, she's working hard at this school to show 
<story>her sister more fun sights.

data.text: Isn't it just～! It's so beautiful!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Isn't it just～! It's so beautiful!

data.text: … Almost a little dazzling.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>… Almost a little dazzling.

data.text: Hey, what's your dream? Let me hear it!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Hey, what's your dream? Let me hear it!

data.text: Hey, what's your dream? Tell me about it!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Hey, what's your dream? Tell me about it!

data.text:
As a trainer at the world-famous Tracen Academy, 
I guess you'd like to train G1 horsegirls? Or 
are you aiming for the world stage～?
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I'd certainly be proud to be in charge of such a girl.
choices.processed: <size=32>I'd certainly be proud to be in charge of such a girl.</size>

data.processed:
<story>As a trainer at the world-famous Tracen Academy, 
<story>I guess you'd like to train G1 horsegirls? Or

data.text:
I would expect so. That's what being a 
trainer is all about, isn't it?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>I would expect so. That's what being a 
<story>trainer is all about, isn't it?

data.text:
Especially the people who work as trainers here 
are all very talented. It's not surprising that 
they're all hungry for success.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Especially the people who work as trainers here 
<story>are all very talented. It's not surprising that

data.text: … I wish I could reciprocate those feelings.
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: … Oh, my. You really are a strange one, aren't you?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>… Oh, my. You really are a strange one, aren't you?

data.text: … Oh, my. You really are a strange one, aren't you?
data.name: Maruzensky

data.processed: <story>Hmmmmmmm…

… Hey, kiddo. We've got a free trainer 
and a horsegirl right here, don't we?

data.processed:

… Hey, honey. We've got a free trainer

data.processed:

data.text:
And since you seemed to be so interested in me that 
you couldn't stop staring at me running—
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:

<story>you couldn't stop staring at me running—

data.text:
And since you seemed to be so interested in me that

data.processed:
<story>And since you seemed to be so interested in me that

Right now, I'm facing a new type of trainer who doesn't 
greedily speak about "Chasing the big prizes" and "Victories", 
and it has me really excited.

data.processed:

And, now, do you think this situation…

data.text: And thus I came to be in charge of Maruzensky…!

data.text:
Oh, right, right! Now that we've taken a step forward in our 
relationship, can I count on you for something right away?

data.processed:

My juniors asked if we could talk through this 
"chat app" instead of only over the phone.

data.processed:
<story>My juniors asked if we could talk through this
